name: [C][H][O][N]
description:
(This game was created on 2016 by our group as a #GGJ2016 submission. )

No retreat, no surrender!

"A lost astronaut fights his life to not die at the hands of an alien tribe with all the rights to kill him."

Controls:

W - A - DMovement
Left ClickActionRight ClickNext combinationQ - EChange individual elements
